title: Cloud Natural Language - Sentence
abstract:
# Cloud Natural Language - Sentence
- [JSON representation](#SCHEMA_REPRESENTATION) Represents a sentence in the input document.| JSON representation               |
|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| { "text": { object (TextSpan) }, "sentiment": { object (Sentiment) } } || Fields | Fields.1                                             |
|:----------|:-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| text  | object (TextSpan) The sentence text.                                      |
| sentiment | object (Sentiment) For calls to [AnalyzeSentiment][] or if AnnotateTextRequest.Features.extract_document_sentiment is set to true, this field will contain the sentiment for the sentence.
